Get card

Undoubtedly the best business card

Free plastic and virtual cards for freelancers and SMEs packed up with next-level expense management solution

  • German IBAN account opened in 48 hours
  • Free VISA debit cards with 0% commission and up to 3% cashback
  • Free employee cards with spending control features
  • Team expenses ready for accounting with receipts collected online
  • Plastic or virtual prepaid cards

FINOM Virtual Card — quick, flexible, secure

  • Pay on the go

    Forget about the hassle of physical cards and pay with just your smart phone using Apple Pay or Google Pay

  • Feel secure

    No magnetic strips, visible card numbers or PINs. No risk of overspending above prepaid limits

  • Issue instanly

    Several clicks to create a card for any purpose and every employee

  • Manage in real-time

    Set limits, freeze, track, top-up or block cards in just a minute from mobile or desktop

Control your team spendings with expense management features

  • Unlimited virtual cards to your team in several clicks

    Enable faster purchasing by issuing personal cards or creating separate sub-accounts for your employees. Customize cards limits and spending policies

  • Full visibility on team spendings

    Enjoy real-time, customizable reporting available in app or desktop. Never miss a transaction with smart notifications.

  • Collect receipts to simplify bookkeeping

    And not just receipts - invoices, contracts and any other document can be easily mapped with any transaction

  • All bank accounts connected

    Combine all your finances in a single interface linking other banks accounts to FINOM. Integration? Will take several minutes and few clicks

  • Manage subscriptions with separate card

    Never let your recurring payments get loose. Issue a separate virtual card to control your subscriptions. Turn it on/off right from the interface and receive additional cashback for certain categories

    (coming soon)

5 steps to get your expenses in control

  • Issue

    plastic and virtual cards

  • Customize

    card limits and spending policies

  • Track

    expenses at a glance

  • Snap

    or upload receipts

  • Import

    accounting-ready data to your software

About us

Olivier Binet Head of business in France
